document.full_text: rahul gandhi, the heir-apparent of india's ruling congress party, was briefly arrested after he joined farmers protesting against land being taken over for a $2 billion highway, underscoring how land disputes are emerging as a political issue.
document.title: india ruling party icon's arrested over land conflict
lines_and_colors: rahul gandhi, the heir-apparent of india's ruling congress party, was briefly arrested after he joined farmers protesting against land being taken over for a $2 billion highway, underscoring how land disputes are emerging as a political issue.
